required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Shear Wave Elastography of Prostate Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Shear Wave Elastography of Prostate Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of significant Shear Wave Elastography Parameters for Prostate Biopsy and Prostate Cancer detection.

detailed_description.textblock: This Study will evaluate the Shear Wave Elastography (SWE) Parameters for Prostate Biopsy and Prostate Cancer detection.

primary_outcome.description: transrectal shear wave elastography with detection of prostate tissue pressure [kilo-Pascal] in correspondence to biopsy areas

secondary_outcome.description: Elasticity and location of benign (normal, benign prostate hyperplasia) or malignant tissue (Prostate Cancer)

secondary_outcome.measure: Differentiation of benign tissue elasticity depending on prostate Location (Basis, Mid, Apex)
secondary_outcome.description: Differentiation of benign tissue elasticity depending on prostate Location (Basis, Mid, Apex)

secondary_outcome.measure: Differentiation of Prostate cancer malignity by Elastography
secondary_outcome.description: Differentiation of low-risk versus intermediate and high-risk Prostate cancer malignity (Gleason score 6 vs. 7-10) by Elastography
Histopathological Analysis of biopsy specimen: benign prostate hyperplasia

arm_group.description: PSA >4ng/ml or PSA-Velocity >0.75ng/ml/a or suspicious rectal examination or Status after external beam therapy of the prostate in prostate cancer. Patients who are able for transrectal ultrasound examination. Transrectal shear wave elastography of the prostate for Transrectal random biopsy of the prostate.

intervention.intervention_name: Transrectal shear wave elastography of the prostate
intervention.description: Transrectal shear wave elastography of the prostate with SuperSonic Imagine Ultrasound System AIXPLORER and an endocavity sonic head SE12-3 (SuperSonic Imagine, Aix-en-Provence, France)

intervention.intervention_name: Transrectal random biopsy of the prostate
intervention.description: TRUS-SWE-guided random biopsies of the Prostata with 18G-gun
intervention.other_name: TRUS-SWE-guided random biopsies of the prostata

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Suspicious for prostate cancer with no pretreatment and Prostata specific Antigen (PSA) >4ng/ml or PSA velocity > 0.75 ng/ml per year or suspicious transrectal digital examination
- Status after external beam radiotherapy of the prostate in localized prostate cancer and suspicious for local prostate cancer recurrence
Exclusion Criteria:

facility.name: Department of Urology University Hospital Otto-von-Guericke-University Magdeburg

results_reference.citation: Correas JM, Tissier AM, Khairoune A, Vassiliu V, Méjean A, Hélénon O, Memo R, Barr RG. Prostate cancer: diagnostic performance of real-time shear-wave elastography. Radiology. 2015 Apr;275(1):280-9. doi: 10.1148/radiol.14140567. Epub 2014 Nov 19.
